lead_paragraph: Former Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton is offering her condolences to those who were killed, hurt or lost their homes when a tornado struck Arkansas.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Sends Sympathy to Tornado Victims
headline.print_headline: Hillary Clinton Sends Sympathy to Tornado Victims

snippet: Former Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton is offering her condolences to those who were killed, hurt or lost their homes when a tornado struck Arkansas....
